item.title: This is one scary movie
item.author: Despoina Paschou,
item.description: Jason Reitman’s third directorial effort (after Thank you for Smoking and my ever-favourite Juno) establishes him as one of Hollywood’s talents and also creates another nepotism case (his father is director Ivan Reitman, of Ghostbusters and Dave fame, who also serves as producer for this movie). He …

item.title: Genuinely interesting diaries
item.author: Despoina Paschou,
item.description: Well, there are some films that when you are a bit too pretentious, you always act as you have seen them (I am one of thefew people on this planet to admit that I have yet to watch The Godfather trilogy. And I am too pretentious for my own good). In the past decade, Walter Salles’ The Motorcycle …
